titles.title: Preserving Options for Everglades Restoration and National Defense in the Straits of Florida Act
Preserving Options for Everglades Restoration and National Defense in the Straits of Florida Act
To extend the prohibition on the joint use of Homestead Air Reserve Base, Homestead, Florida, by the Air Force and civil aircraft.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Preserving Options for Everglades Restoration and National Defense in the Straits of Florida Act
This bill permanently prohibits the Department of the Air Force from entering into an agreement that would provide for or permit the joint use of Homestead Air Reserve Base in Homestead, Florida, by the Air Force and civil aircraft.
